graphs.query:
endpoint.os = * 
| group count = count() by agent.version
| limit 10
graphs.title: Top 10 Agent Version

graphs.query:
endpoint.os = windows 
| group count = count() by agent.version
| limit 10
graphs.title: Top 10 Windows Agent Version

graphs.query:
endpoint.os = macos 
| group count = count() by agent.version
| limit 10
graphs.title: Top 10 MacOS Agent Version

graphs.query:
endpoint.os = linux 
| group count = count() by agent.version
| limit 10
graphs.title: Top 10 Linux Agent Version
